rewrite1:
Please make the following formatting changes to the document:

- In the second paragraph, set the space before the paragraph to one line and ensure that no text is in bold.
  
- For the ninth paragraph, modify the text color to the hexadecimal value #FAFAD2 and increase the font size to 16 points.

- Regarding the eighth paragraph, align the text to the center and create a space of three lines after the paragraph. Change the text color to black and add a right indent of negative 2 centimeters.
